thread.title: Big 5 store manager quits after being forced to sell a gun to man she found threatening, suit says - LA Times

author: Matt Hamilton
title: Big 5 store manager quits after being forced to sell a gun to man she found threatening, suit says - LA Times
text:
Matt Hamilton Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss 
Trump's travel ban is likely to head to the Supreme Court , the most controversial ad of the Super Bowl , California's gearing up to fight the Zika virus , and prosecutors have charged an L.A. County jail guard with assault . Caption 90 seconds: 4 stories you can't miss 
Trump's travel ban is likely to head to the Supreme Court , the most controversial ad of the Super Bowl , California's gearing up to fight the Zika virus , and prosecutors have charged an L.A. County jail guard with assault . Caption 'My life turned upside down': Iraqi student returns to L.A. 
Abdullah Al-Rifaie, an Iraqi student, gains U.S. reentry after the court stay of President Trump's travel ban from seven Middle Eastern, predominantly Muslim countries. 
Abdullah Al-Rifaie, an Iraqi student, gains U.S. reentry after the court stay of President Trump's travel ban from seven Middle Eastern, predominantly Muslim countries. Caption Black hole takes a long time to devour star 
Black holes are extremely compact and dense, generating incredibly powerful gravitational forces. Here is a quick look at at XJ1500+0154 from the Chandra X-ray Observatory. 
Black holes are extremely compact and dense, generating incredibly powerful gravitational forces. Here is a quick look at at XJ1500+0154 from the Chandra X-ray Observatory. Caption Community leaders rally in solidarity with Muslim community 
Jarin Islam of the Wilshire Center-Koreatown Neighborhood Council joins other community advocates and leaders for a news conference and solidarity rally with the Muslim community of Los Angeles.
